page.title: 02Yarm Town Hall
page.content: The Town Hall was built in 1710 by { {Viscount Fauconberg,}who was one of the Lords of the Manor.Before the arches were bricked up in 1878 a market was held inside,then in 1957 the toilets were built. In 1925 the {Clapham brothers}decided to buy the Town Hall from the Lord of the Manor, later on they decided to give it to the{Parish Council}and they now use it for their meetings. On the top of the Town Hall there is a clock with a big bell which is rung every hour.There is also a flag pole and a flag is hoisted on a Royal occasion. Also on top there is a {Windvane}with the date when the Town Hall was built (1710).The steps up to the Town Hall are the original steps and lead to the room where the Parish council meet. There is a{war {memorial}beside the Town Hall.
